scripts.build: bun run pre-build && vite build --outDir dist
scripts.extension: bun run pre-build && vite build --outDir dist_extension && mkdir ./dist_extension/tictactoe_spiral && mv ./dist_extension/assets/extension_content_script.*.js ./dist_extension/assets/extension_content_script.js && mv ./dist_extension/assets/App.*.css ./dist_extension/assets/App.css && mv ./dist_extension/assets ./dist_extension/tictactoe_spiral/assets && cp extension_background.js extension_content_script.js ./dist_extension
scripts.e2e-peer-js: cross-env-shell PORT=18765 HTTPS=true ROOT_PATH=./radata_18765 'cd ../peer && rm -rf ./radata_18765 && pnpm start-dev'
scripts.e2e-deps: cross-env-shell IS_TEST=1 bun run build && cross-env-shell IS_TEST=1 concurrently "bun run e2e-peer-rs" "bun run e2e-peer-js" "bun run serve"
scripts.dev-deps: concurrently 'bun run peer-rs' 'bun run peer-js' 'bun run dev'
